column4: What's up peeps, I making a bootable usb with Ubuntu using UNetbootin and I'm comfused what to choose from the dropdown next to distrubution, help please
look down, there is an option for ISO. The dropdown for distro you can ignore
be sure to MD5 test the ISO first
this is the biggist space between to radio I've ever seen :P, how to make the md5 test??
